sentences.en: Under state law, it is a misdemeanour to possess a firearm on school premises.
sentences.cn: 根据该州法律，在校园里拥有枪械是一种轻罪。

sentences.en: I was excited but nervous, never having shot a firearm.
sentences.cn: 我很激动但也很紧张，因为我从来没射击过。

sentences.en: A female cop surveys a field near a highway, her firearm in tow.
sentences.cn: 一位女警视察一处高速公路旁的田野时拖着她的枪。
